SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.actor.plane

Class PlaneFactory

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.actor.plane.PlaneFactory
public class PlaneFactory extends Object
The PlaneFactory class is responsible for creating various types of planes in the game. It uses the ActorSpawner to spawn different plane instances based on the specified PlaneType.
See Also:

      public FighterPlane createPlane(PlaneType type)
      Creates a FighterPlane based on the specified PlaneType.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of plane to create
      Returns:
      a FighterPlane instance corresponding to the specified type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified plane type is unknown

    • createPlane

      public FighterPlane createPlane(PlaneType type, int playerId)
      Creates a FighterPlane based on the specified PlaneType and playerId.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the plane to be created
      playerId - the ID of the player for whom the plane is being created
      Returns:
      a FighterPlane instance of the specified type for the given player

    • getUserInitialYPosition

      public static double getUserInitialYPosition(int playerId)
      Retrieves the initial Y position for a user plane based on the player ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player (1 or 2)
      Returns:
      the initial Y position for the specified player ID - 0 if the playerId is not 1 or 2
